justification: The Offering ('The Ring is corrupting.') and Interfaces ('The pirates discovered an ancient artifact.') do not mention point clouds, 3D visualizations, LiDAR, or any relevant technology. There is no evidence the vendor addresses rendering 3D visualizations from point cloud data or facilitating user interaction with such datasets.
ability: The ability to render 3D visualizations from point cloud data sets generated by LiDAR and other scanning technologies
